thread.title: BRIEF-Monsanto And Pairwise Announce R&D Collaboration

title: BRIEF-Monsanto And Pairwise Announce R&D Collaboration
text: March 20, 2018 / 1:35 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Monsanto And Pairwise Announce R&D Collaboration Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Monsanto Co: * MONSANTO AND PAIRWISE ANNOUNCE RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT COLLABORATION TO ACCELERATE INNOVATION IN AGRICULTURE WITH GENE EDITING * MONSANTO CO - PAIRWISE WILL WORK IN CORN, SOYBEANS, WHEAT, COTTON AND CANOLA CROPS EXCLUSIVELY WITH MONSANTO * MONSANTO CO - ‍UNDER AGREEMENT, PAIRWISE WILL WORK IN CORN, SOYBEANS, WHEAT, COTTON AND CANOLA CROPS EXCLUSIVELY WITH MONSANTO​ * MONSANTO CO - CO WOULD CONTRIBUTE $100 MILLION TO ACCESS, DEVELOP PAIRWISE IP IN ROW CROP APPLICATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
